name: RETROBIKE FURY
description:
ENTER THE FURY

You get on your bike. Put on your helmet. The road is waiting for you. You can see the security system ready to stop you. But you took with you your weapons. You are ready for this. Don't let them stop you. Be fast, agile, and deadly.

GO FULL SPEED

RETROBIKE FURY is a Virtual-Reality game (still playable without, but not gonna lie, it's way less fun) set in a futuristic world. You will drive an incredibly fast motorbike equipped with various weapons. Use your arsenal wisely to ensure you survive throughout the various levels. Destroy as much ennemies as possible and do combos to score high !

CREDITS

Alexandre Lacombe - Development / Level Design / Level Building

Kevin Assor - Lead Development / Audio
